318 class OPENMM_EXPORT CustomIntegrator : public Integrator {
319 public:
323  enum ComputationType {
327  ComputeGlobal = 0,
331  ComputePerDof = 1,
335  ComputeSum = 2,
339  ConstrainPositions = 3,
343  ConstrainVelocities = 4,
347  UpdateContextState = 5,
351  IfBlockStart = 6,
355  WhileBlockStart = 7,
359  BlockEnd = 8
360  };
366  CustomIntegrator(double stepSize);
367  ~CustomIntegrator();
371  int getNumGlobalVariables() const {
372  return globalNames.size();
373  }
377  int getNumPerDofVariables() const {
378  return perDofNames.size();
379  }
383  int getNumComputations() const {
384  return computations.size();
385  }
389  int getNumTabulatedFunctions() const {
390  return functions.size();
391  }

406  const std::string& getGlobalVariableName(int index) const;
415  int addPerDofVariable(const std::string& name, double initialValue);

450  void setGlobalVariableByName(const std::string& name, double value);
458  void getPerDofVariable(int index, std::vector<Vec3>& values) const;

473  void setPerDofVariable(int index, const std::vector<Vec3>& values);
480  void setPerDofVariableByName(const std::string& name, const std::vector<Vec3>& values);
490  int addComputeGlobal(const std::string& variable, const std::string& expression);
501  int addComputePerDof(const std::string& variable, const std::string& expression);
513  int addComputeSum(const std::string& variable, const std::string& expression);
520  int addConstrainPositions();
527  int addConstrainVelocities();
534  int addUpdateContextState();
545  int beginIfBlock(const std::string& condition);
556  int beginWhileBlock(const std::string& condition);
563  int endBlock();
576  void getComputationStep(int index, ComputationType& type, std::string& variable, std::string& expression) const;
586  int addTabulatedFunction(const std::string& name, TabulatedFunction* function);
593  const TabulatedFunction& getTabulatedFunction(int index) const;
600  TabulatedFunction& getTabulatedFunction(int index);
607  const std::string& getTabulatedFunctionName(int index) const;
613  const std::string& getKineticEnergyExpression() const;
619  void setKineticEnergyExpression(const std::string& expression);
623  int getRandomNumberSeed() const {
624  return randomNumberSeed;
625  }
638  void setRandomNumberSeed(int seed) {
639  randomNumberSeed = seed;
640  }
646  void step(int steps);
647 protected:
653  void initialize(ContextImpl& context);
658  void cleanup();
662  void stateChanged(State::DataType changed);
666  std::vector<std::string> getKernelNames();
670  double computeKineticEnergy();
674  bool kineticEnergyRequiresForce() const;
675 private:
676  class ComputationInfo;
677  class FunctionInfo;
678  std::vector<std::string> globalNames;
679  std::vector<std::string> perDofNames;
680  mutable std::vector<double> globalValues;
681  std::vector<std::vector<Vec3> > perDofValues;
682  std::vector<ComputationInfo> computations;
683  std::vector<FunctionInfo> functions;
684  std::string kineticEnergy;
685  mutable bool globalsAreCurrent;

687  bool forcesAreValid, keNeedsForce;
688  Kernel kernel;
689 };
